resources: MyNews Search Settings Notifications Help About Article Title Date SectionSubsection Open navigation drawer Close navigation drawer MyNews Top Stories Most Popular Science Search query term Begin date Select a date Arts Business Entrepreneurs End date Politics Sports Travel Enable notifications (once per day) Environment Food Health Movies Technology Weather Other categories The MyNews application is a study project. It corresponds to project 5 of the \"DA - Android\" course in the OpenClassRooms school. The application allows you to view articles from the NewYorkTimes and receive notifications on a category of articles sought. Main Categories Menu When a category is selected : - Returns to the corresponding tab of the home screen for the main categories. - It opens a new window for the other categories. Toolbar Search : You must have selected one term and at least one category. The search result is displayed in a new window. Notification : Notification is sent daily if one or more articles have been published in the last 24 hours. You must have selected one term and at least one category. ArticleImage //TOAST\\ Please enter a query. Please choose at least one category. Please enter a query and choose at least one category.
